fields.name: mutationChance
fields.description: Mutation chance - probability 0-100 that mutants mutate after a battle

fields.name: minHealth
fields.description: Min HP - minimum health gained in an MHP level up

fields.name: maxHealth
fields.description: Max HP - maximum health gained in an MHP level up

fields.name: weightHp
fields.description: HP weight - weight of an MHP gain relative to other gains

fields.name: weightStr
fields.description: STR weight - weight of a STR gain relative to other gains

fields.name: weightDef
fields.description: DEF weight - weight of a DEF gain relative to other gains

fields.name: weightAgi
fields.description: AGI weight - weight of an AGI gain relative to other gains

fields.name: weightMana
fields.description: MAN weight - weight of a MAN gain relative to other gains

fields.name: weightAbil
fields.description: Ability weight - weight of learning an ability relative to other gains

fields.name: key
fields.description: The key of this object used in code -- don't change these!

fields.name: subfolder
fields.description: Used to subcategorize objects ("/bosses" or "/areas/towns" for instance)

fields.name: name
fields.description: The display name of this object, used only by humans like you

fields.name: description
fields.description: Notes and whatnot on this object
